vampire.editor.plugin.api.domain.sheet

Interface MeritAPI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Nameable

    public interface MeritAPI
extends Nameable
    Merit stores the cost and the name of a merit.
    Note: There is no difference between a merit and a flaw in the model.
    Merits have positive cost and flaws have negative cost.
    Author:
    rex_victor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MeritAPI clone()
      Returns a deep copy of this merit.
      int getCost()
      Returns the cost of this merit.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Return the name of this merit.

    • Method Detail

      • getCost

        int getCost()
        Returns the cost of this merit. If it is a flaw the cost is negative, else it is positve.
        Returns:
        the cost of this merit.

        Return the name of this merit.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        the name

      • clone

        Returns a deep copy of this merit.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        a deep copy.
